title: Online Expert Development Program for ICT-Enhanced Secondary Science Lesson Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A project-based assessment program conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment. Learners consist of office/administrative professionals, focusing on enhancing ICT-based science lesson design skills applicable to real classrooms.

learning_goals: Learners can develop ICT-enhanced lesson designs linked to science curricula utilizing various digital tools
Learners can apply smartphone-based ICT instructional materials to actual classroom settings
Learners can perform the process of revising and improving lesson designs based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
